segments.text: Excuse me , I'd like to try some Chinese food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We serve excellent Chinese food . Which style do you prefer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know nothing about Chinese food . Could you give me some suggestions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's divided into 8 big cuisines such as Cantonese food , Shandong food , Sichuan food etc .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , Cantonese food is lighter while Shandong food is heavier and spicy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Most Sichuan dishes are spicy and hot . They taste differently .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , really . I like hot food . So what is your recommendation for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think Mapo bean curd and shredded meat in chili sauce are quite special and delicious . We have a Sichuan food dining room . May I suggest you to go there ? It's on the third floor .
segments.speaker: S2
